ukCompanyNameType.description: Allow Unicode blocks Basic Latin (Space to Tilde), printable Latin-1 Supplement (¡ to ÿ), and all of Latin Extended-A and Latin Extended-B and IP Extensions (Ā to ʯ), all the Latin Extended Additional characters (Ḁ to ỿ), General Punctuation characters Hyphen to Horizontal Bar (‐ to ―), General Punctuation characters (‘ to ‟), Currency Symbol characters (₠ to ₿), Letterlike Symbols Å and K

globalCompanyNameType.description: Allow Unicode blocks Basic Latin (Space to Tilde), printable Latin-1 Supplement (¡ to ÿ), and all of Latin Extended-A and Latin Extended-B and IP Extensions (Ā to ʯ), all the Latin Extended Additional characters (Ḁ to ỿ), General Punctuation characters Hyphen to Horizontal Bar (‐ to ―), General Punctuation characters (‘ to ‟), Currency Symbol characters (₠ to ₿), Letterlike Symbols Å and K

legalEntityIdentifierType.description: A Legal Entity Identifier (LEI); format is as per the ISO 17442 standard - 18 uppercase alphabetic or numeric characters followed by 2 numeric characters

dateType.description: Date in the format YYYY-MM-DD in the range 1900-01-01 to 2099-12-31 accommodating leap years

declaration.description: Declaration to confirm the listed companies constitute at least 50% of the eligible companies

publicInfrastructure.description: Indicate if any of the companies has made a qualifying infrastructure company (QIC) election

submissionType.description: Indicate whether this is the first (original) return or an amended (revised) return
